entity.name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez
entity.description: US Representative from New York Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

text: @AOC I have read several doctor reports on the Corona virus. It can be as small as a common cold or like pneumonia. It's not any more dangerous than the flu was before the flu vaccination. My question is, why are the Democrats weaponizing it in creating a crisis where there is none?
